sentences.english: There would be a museum to display the history of Kowloon Walled City .
sentences.chinese: 另外增設博物館，展出九龍寨城的歷史及舊貌。

sentences.english: He preached a doctrine which was new to him.
sentences.chinese: 他對教義的解釋一改舊貌。

sentences.english: This is a facelift of what we already have.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個我們已經舊貌換新顏。

sentences.english: Makes black night beauteous, and her old face new.
sentences.chinese: 黑夜因你美麗舊貌換新樣。

sentences.english: A fresh coat of paint will dress up the old house.
sentences.chinese: 刷層新油漆會使這房子舊貌換新顏。
